Title: Ghost Ship
Writer: Mark Hanlon (story), Mark Hanlon (screenplay), John Pogue (screenplay)
Actors: Gabriel Byrne, Julianna Margulies, Ron Eldard, Desmond Harrington
Plot: A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board.
Production: Village Roadshow Prod., Dark Castle Entertainment
